entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to 14 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
